meta.name: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
meta.description: Jimmy Carr hosts as Sean Lock and Jon Richardson play the words and numbers game.

videos.title: Christmas Special
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a special Christmas edition of 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown, packed with festive surprises. Jon Richardson and Daisy May Cooper take on Rob Beckett and Judi Love. Katie Norris joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. And as festive tradition dictates, Joe Wilkinson hinders Rachel Riley with the letters and numbers.

videos.title: Rob Beckett, Rhod Gilbert, Tim Key, Lee Mack
Richard Osman, Stephen Mangan, Henning Wehn, Lee Mack
Jason Manford, Rhod Gilbert, Danny Dyer
Rhod Gilbert, Miles Jupp, Nick Helm
Humphrey Ker, Sarah Millican, Rich Hall
Sarah Millican, Chris Ramsey, Abandoman
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the iconic words and numbers quiz, as 8 Out of 10 Cats team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson are joined by celebrity guests Sarah Millican and Chris Ramsey. Countdown regular Susie Dent shares Dictionary Corner with Abandoman, while the country's favourite boffin Rachel Riley dispenses the letters and numbers with a little help from comedian Joe Wilkinson.

videos.title: Bob Mortimer, Adam Hills, Lee Mack, Alex Horne and The Horne Selection
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts this edition with captain Jon Richardson and special guest captain Lee Mack who are joined by celebrity guests Bob Mortimer and Adam Hills. Countdown regular Susie Dent is in Dictionary Corner with help from Alex Horne and the Horne Section while the country's favourite boffin, Rachel Riley, provides the letters and numbers with a little help from comedian Joe Wilkinson.

videos.title: 80s Night Special: David O'Doherty, Henning Wehn, Vic Reeves, Lee Mack
videos.overview: This show gets a 1980s makeover as part of Channel 4 80s Night. Jimmy Carr hosts a new edition of the ultimate 80s words and numbers quiz show, launched in 1982. Jon Richardson and special guest captain Lee Mack are joined by celebrity guests Henning Wehn and David O'Doherty. Countdown regular Susie Dent is joined by Vic Reeves in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley provides the letters and numbers with a little 'help' from comedian Joe Wilkinson.

videos.title: Bob Mortimer, Holly Walsh, Claudia Winkleman, Isy Suttie
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr, Sean Lock and Jon Richardson are joined by Bob Mortimer and Holly Walsh for more comic innuendos and unpredictable conundrums. Claudia Winkleman stands in for Rachel Riley on letters-and-numbers duty, while Isy Suttie is in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent is in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Johnny Vegas, Sara Pascoe, Alex Brooker, Claudia Winkleman, Rob Beckett, Tom Allen
videos.overview: Jon Richardson takes on guest team captain Johnny Vegas in another round of words and numbers chaos with Strictly host Claudia Winkleman and comedians Tom Allen & Rob Beckett.

videos.title: Rebecca Front, Kevin Bridges, Joe Lycett
videos.overview: Jon Richardson takes on team captain Sean Lock in another round of words and numbers chaos with Rebecca Front and Kevin Bridges. Joe Lycett is in the corner with Susie Dent.

videos.title: Katherine Ryan, David Mitchell, Nick Helm
videos.overview: Katherine Ryan & David Mitchell join team captains Sean & Jon for another round of light-hearted words and numbers fun. Nick Helm assists in dictionary corner.

videos.title: Henning Wehn, Victoria Coren Mitchell, Tom Allen
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr returns to host a brand new episode with Sean Lock and Henning Wehn who go up against Jon Richardson and Victoria Coren Mitchell. Tom Allen joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters with 'help' from Joe Wilkinson.

videos.title: Roisin Conaty, Nish Kumar, Adam Buxton
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts as Sean Lock and Roisin Conaty go up against Jon Richardson and Nish Kumar. Adam Buxton joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, with Rachel Riley.

videos.title: David O'Doherty, Natasia Demetriou, John Kearns
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr returns to host a brand new episode with Sean Lock and David O'Doherty who go up against Jon Richardson and Natasia Demetriou. John Kearns joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.title: David Mitchell, Katherine Ryan, The Brett Domino Trio
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts with Sean Lock and David Mitchell going up against Jon Richardson and Katherine Ryan. Brett Domino Trio joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.title: Claudia Winkleman, Johnny Vegas, Reginald D. Hunter, Sara Pascoe
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr returns to host a brand new episode with guest captain Claudia Winkleman and Johnny Vegas going up against Jon Richardson and Reginald D Hunter. Sara Pascoe joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters. Joe Wilkinson will also be appearing.

videos.title: David Walliams, Jonathan Ross, Joe Lycett, Isy Suttie
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr returns to host a brand new episode with guest captain David Walliams and Jonathan Ross going up against Jon Richardson and Joe Lycett. Isy Suttie joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.title: Lee Mack, Catherine Tate, Miles Jupp, John Cooper Clarke
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a brand new episode with guest captain Lee Mack and Catherine Tate going up against Sean Lock and Miles Jupp. John Cooper Clarke joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.title: David Walliams, Jessica Hynes, Rhod Gilbert, Sam Simmons
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a brand new episode with guest captain David Walliams and Jessica Hynes going up against Jon Richardson and Rhod Gilbert. Sam Simmons joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts with Sean Lock and Danny Dyer vs Joe Wilkinson and Gabby Logan. David O'Doherty joins Dictionary Corner, with Susie Dent and Rachel Riley.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts, David Mitchell and Cariad Lloyd take on Jon Richardson and Russell Howard. Sam Simmons joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley flips the tiles.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a new edition of the topical panel game with Sean Lock and Stephen Mangan who take on Noel Fielding and Fay Ripley. The Brett Domino Trio are in with Susie Dent, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a comedy version of the quiz show. Jon Richardson and Phil Wang take on guest captain Russell Howard and Roisin Conaty. Nick Helm is in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a new edition of the topical panel game with Jon Richardson and David O'Doherty who take on guest captain Johnny Vegas and Jamie Laing. Holly Walsh joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the words and numbers quiz with Sean Lock and Joe Wilkinson who take on Jon Richardson and Jayde Adams. David Baddiel is in Dictionary Corner.

videos.overview: The comedy hybrid returns. Jimmy Carr hosts, and it's Jon Richardson and James Acaster versus Lee Mack and Sarah Millican, with John Cooper Clarke in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Chris Addison, Joe Wilkinson, Katherine Ryan, David O'Doherty
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a new episode of the panel/quiz show mash-up, as the 8 Out of 10 Cats crew take over the words and numbers quiz. In this edition it's Jon Richardson and Chris Addison against Joe Wilkinson and Katherine Ryan, with David O'Doherty in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Joe Lycett, Michelle Wolf, Adam Riches
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a new edition of the panel/quiz show mash-up. In this episode, Jon Richardson and Joe Lycett take on Sean Lock and Michelle Wolf, with Adam Riches in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Joe Wilkinson, Kevin Bridges, Jessica Knappett, John Cooper Clarke
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a brand new series of the words and numbers game. Jon Richardson and Joe Wilkinson take on guest captain Kevin Bridges and Jessica Knappett. John Cooper Clarke is in with Susie Dent and Rachel Riley is in charge of the letters and numbers.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts another new edition of the words and numbers game. Lee Mack and Victoria Coren Mitchell take on Alan Carr and Dane Baptiste. Sam Simmons is in with Susie Dent, and Rachel Riley is in charge of the letters and numbers.

videos.title: Katherine Ryan, Roisin Conaty, Jessica Hynes, Sara Pascoe, Lolly Adefope, Morgana Robinson
videos.overview: Katherine Ryan guest hosts a very special all female edition celebrating 100 years of women's suffrage. Roisin Conaty and Jessica Hynes take on Sara Pascoe and Lolly Adefope in the classic words and numbers quiz. Morgana Robinson appears in character as Natalie Cassidy alongside Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while maths whizz Rachel Riley looks after the numbers.

videos.title: Katherine Ryan, Joe Wilkinson, John Cooper Clarke
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a brand new episode with Sean Lock and Katherine Ryan who take on Jon Richardson and Joe Wilkinson in the classic words and number quiz. Dr. John Cooper Clarke joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while maths whizz Rachel Riley looks after the numbers.

videos.title: Miles Jupp, Alan Carr, Roisin Conaty, Ivan Brackenbury
videos.overview: Sean Lock and Miles Jupp take on guest captain Alan Carr and Roisin Conaty in the classic words and number quiz. Ivan Brackenbury joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a brand new episode of 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown, as Sean Lock and Rob Beckett take on Jon Richardson and Claudia Winkleman. Plus special guests Mr. Swallow and Joe Wilkinson join Countdown regulars Susie Dent and Rachel Riley for the classic words and numbers quiz.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts as Jon Richardson and Tom Allen take on Sean Lock and Rosie Jones. With Dictionary Corner guest Adam Riches as Sean Bean, plus experts Susie Dent and Rachel Riley.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts as Sean Lock and Daisy May Cooper take on Richard Ayoade and Ivo Graham. Adam Buxton joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Joe Wilkinson assists Rachel Riley.

videos.overview: Katherine Ryan and Joe Lycett take on Johnny Vegas and Sean Lock in the words-and-numbers game, while would-be novelist Christopher Bliss joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. Hosted by Jimmy Carr with Rachel Riley looking after the numbers and letters.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the game of words and numbers, with Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Sean Lock and Paul Foot play against Jon Richardson and Angela Barnes while John Cooper Clarke joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.overview: Sean Lock and Harriet Kemsley take on Jon Richardson and Joe Lycett in the words-and-numbers game, while Mat Ewins joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the game show mash-up, with Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Jon Richardson and Sara Pascoe take on Sean Lock and Richard Ayoade. Nick Helm joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the game show mash-up, with Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Jon Richardson and Lucy Beaumont take on Roisin Conaty and Joe Wilkinson in the comedy words-and-numbers game, while Bec Hill joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Joe Wilkinson, Lee Mack, Katherine Ryan, The Brett Domino Trio
videos.overview: Jon Richardson and Joe Wilkinson take on Lee Mack and Katherine Ryan in the comedy words-and-numbers game, while The Brett Domino Trio join Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. Hosted by Jimmy Carr, with Rachel Riley looking after the numbers and letters.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts as Roisin Conaty and Kiri Pritchard-McLean take on Jon Richardson and Rob Beckett. Comedian Huge Davies is in Dictionary Corner. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate.

videos.title: Jack Dee, Tom Allen, Judi Love, John Cooper Clarke
videos.overview: Jack Dee and Tom Allen take on Jon Richardson and Judi Love. With Dr John Cooper Clarke.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts, as Roisin Conaty and Asim Chaudhry take on Jon Richardson and Josh Widdicombe. Bill Bailey is in Dictionary Corner. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts, as Lee Mack and Joe Wilkinson take on Jon Richardson and Jessica Knappett. Comedian Nigel Ng is in Dictionary Corner. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate.

videos.title: Sarah Millican, Nish Kumar, Maisie Adam, David O'Doherty
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the game show mash-up, with Countdown regulars Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Sarah Millican and Nish Kumar take on Jon Richardson and Maisie Adam. David O'Doherty is in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Sean Lock, Harry Hill, Rosie Jones, Nick Mohammed
videos.overview: In his final appearance the late Sean Lock is joined by Harry Hill as they take on Jon Richardson and Rosie Jones. Mr Swallow, aka Nick Mohammed, is in Dictionary Corner. Jimmy Carr hosts, while regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate.

videos.title: Lucy Beaumont, Richard Ayoade, Joe Wilkinson, Finlay Christie
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a combination of the comedy panel show and the long-running words-and-numbers quiz, with Jon Richardson and Lucy Beaumont taking on Richard Ayoade and Joe Wilkinson. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, alongside Dictionary Corner guest Finlay Christie.

videos.title: Alan Carr, Harriet Kemsley, Jonathan Ross, Maisie Adam, Huge Davies
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts and regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate Alan Carr and Harriet Kemsley play against Jonathan Ross and Maisie Adam. Huge Davies is in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Jo Brand, Joe Wilkinson, Jamali Maddix, Rachel Parris
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts and regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate as Jon Richardson and Jo Brand take on Joe Wilkinson and Jamali Maddix. Rachel Parris is in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Richard Ayoade, Sara Pascoe, Chris McCausland, Morgana Robinson
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy words-and-numbers quiz as Richard Ayoade and Sara Pascoe take on Jon Richardson and Chris McCausland. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, aided by Morgana Robinson in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Roisin Conaty, Joe Wilkinson, Nabil Abdulrashid, David O'Doherty
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy words-and-numbers quiz as Roisin Conaty and Joe Wilkinson take on Jon Richardson and Nabil Abdulrashid. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, aided by David O'Doherty in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Jonathan Ross, Russell Kane, Alan Carr, Judi Love, Josh Jones
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a combination of the comedy panel show and the long-running words and numbers quiz, with Jonathan Ross and Russell Kane taking on Alan Carr and Judi Love. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, while Josh Jones is in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Jonathan Ross, Joe Wilkinson, Roisin Conaty, Ahir Shah, Catherine Cohen
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the game show mash-up, as Jonathan Ross and Joe Wilkinson take on Roisin Conaty and Ahir Shah. Catherine Cohen joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Dr Anne-Marie Imafidon looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.title: Sarah Millican, Phil Wang, Roisin Conaty, Tom Allen, Sam Campbell, Joe Wilkinson
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the game show mash-up, as Sarah Millican and Phil Wang take on Tom Allen and Roisin Conaty. Sam Campbell joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.title: Best Bits 3
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr, Susie Dent and Rachel Riley host a compilation of best bits from the anarchic letters and numbers game, featuring Sean Lock, Jon Richardson, Harry Hill, Bob Mortimer, Katherine Ryan, Joe Lycett, Rose Matafeo, Richard Ayoade, Chris McCausland, Miles Jupp, Lucy Beaumont, Alex Horne and Joe Wilkinson among others.

videos.title: Best Bits 4
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr, Susie Dent and Rachel Riley host a compilation of best bits from the anarchic letters and numbers game, featuring Sean Lock, Jon Richardson, Joe Wilkinson, Lucy Beaumont, Bob Mortimer, Rosie Jones, Paul Foot, Kevin Bridges, Nick Helm and Victoria Coren-Mitchell among others.

videos.title: Harriet Kemsley, Lee Mack, Munya Chawawa, David O'Doherty
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the anarchic letters and numbers mash-up, with Countdown regulars Susie Dent and Rachel Riley. Jon Richardson and Harriet Kemsley take on Lee Mack and Munya Chawawa, while David O'Doherty joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Joe Wilkinson, Rob Beckett, Sarah Millican, Jamali Maddix, Glenn Moore
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the anarchic letters and numbers mash-up, with Countdown regulars Susie Dent and Rachel Riley. Joe Wilkinson and Rob Beckett take on Sarah Millican and Jamali Maddix, while Glenn Moore joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Rob Brydon, Katherine Parkinson, Babatunde Aléshé, Adam Buxton, Joe Wilkinson
videos.overview: Rob Brydon and Katherine Parkinson take on Jon Richardson and Babatunde Aléshé. Adam Buxton joins Susie in Dictionary Corner, while Joe Wilkinson helps Rachel with the numbers in his own inimitable fashion.

videos.title: Rhod Gilbert, Sarah Millican, Judi Love, Joe Lycett, Jazz Emu
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the words and numbers game show mash-up, with Countdown regulars Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Rhod Gilbert and Sarah Millican take on Judi Love and Joe Lycett, while Jazz Emu joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Asim Chaudhry, Joe Wilkinson, Roisin Conaty, Lucy Pearman
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr presents as Jon Richardson and Asim Chaudhry take on Joe Wilkinson and Roisin Conaty. Lucy Pearman is in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.

videos.title: Dan Tiernan, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Ryan, John Kearns
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a hybrid of the comedy panel show and the words-and-numbers quiz, as Jon Richardson and Dan Tiernan take on Richard Ayoade and Katherine Ryan. Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while John Kearns joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while Don Rodolfo - aka Ciarán Dowd - joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while Mat Ewins joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts as Richard Ayoade and Kemah Bob take on Jonathan Ross and Maisie Adam in the classic words and numbers quiz. Sarah Keyworth joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Dr Anne-Marie Imafidon fills in for Rachel Riley looking after the letters and numbers.

videos.title: Sarah Millican, Josh Widdicombe, Alan Carr, Thanyia Moore, The Delightful Sausage
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a hybrid of the comedy panel show and the words-and-numbers quiz, as Sarah Millican and Josh Widdicombe take on Alan Carr and Thanyia Moore. Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while comedy duo The Delightful Sausage join lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Rosie Jones, Joe Wilkinson, Phil Wang, John Cooper Clarke
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a hybrid of the comedy panel show and words-and-numbers quiz, as Jon Richardson and Rosie Jones take on Joe Wilkinson and Phil Wang. Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while Dr John Cooper Clarke joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Guz Khan, Katherine Ryan, Joe Wilkinson, Alasdair Beckett-King
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a hybrid of the comedy panel show and words-and-numbers quiz, as on Jon Richardson and Guz Khan take on guest captain Katherine Ryan and Joe Wilkinson. Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while Alasdair Beckett-King joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

videos.title: Danny Dyer, Big Zuu, Helen Bauer, Mat Ewins
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a combination of the comedy panel show and the long-running words-and-numbers quiz, with Jon Richardson and Big Zuu taking on Danny Dyer and Helen Bauer. Mathematician Rachel Riley looks after the letters and numbers, while Mat Ewins joins lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Richard Ayoade, Amy Gledhill, Guz Khan, Sam Campbell
videos.overview: The new series of Cats Does Countdown continues. Jimmy Carr hosts as Jon Richardson and Amy Gledhill take on Richard Ayoade and Guz Khan. Sam Campbell joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. With Rachel Riley.

videos.title: Richard Ayoade, Harriet Dyer, Bob Mortimer, Tom Allen, Ian Smith
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts a combination of the comedy panel show and the long-running words and numbers quiz, with Richard Ayoade and Harriet Dyer taking on Bob Mortimer and Tom Allen. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, Joe Wilkinson drops in and Ian Smith joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Joe Wilkinson, Josh Widdicombe, Rhod Gilbert, Thaniya Moore, Joe Kent-Walters
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts as Joe Wilkinson and Josh Widdicombe take on Rhod Gilbert and Thaniya Moore in the long-running-words and numbers quiz. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, while alternative comedian Joe Kent-Walters (aka Frankie Monroe) sits alongside Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Joe Wilkinson, Alex Brooker, Kevin Bridges, Judi Love, Peter Serafinowicz
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy game show with Joe Wilkinson and Alex Brooker taking on Kevin Bridges and Judi Love. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, with Peter Serafinowicz in the guise of Brian Butterfield joining Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Roisin Conaty, Phil Wang, Joe Wilkinson, Lou Sanders, David O'Doherty
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts, as Roisin Conaty and Phil Wang compete against Joe Wilkinson and Lou Sanders. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, while David O'Doherty joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

videos.title: Lucy Beaumont, Rob Brydon, Joe Wilkinson, Huge Davies
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts, inviting Jon Richardson and Lucy Beaumont to compete against Rob Brydon and Joe Wilkinson. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, while Huge Davies joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.
